children.subject: Hi, I filled the form but I was wondering if any other information needs to be provided since the application does not ask for many details? What factors are valued the most? Is it the GPA?

history.content:
Hello everyone!!

Hope everyone is having a good summer! We're looking for students at UC Berkeley who have taken Data 8, received a B or better (or P for Spring 2020), are passionate about the course, and have the potential to become tutors and UGSIs in future semesters, to be learning assistants for Fall 2020. 

 

Deadline: Tuesday 8/25 at 11:59pm PST
Orientation: Tuesday 9/1 1pm-2pm PST (Zoom link will be emailed)
First lab with learning assistants: Wednesday, Thursday, Friday 9/2-9/4

Learning assistants will work for 3 hr/week. The breakdown of the 3 hours consists of:
- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. doing the weekly lab ahead of time, consulting with the (U)GSI, etc.)
- 1.5 hours of assisting in lab
- 0.5 hour for pedagogy practice, 2 meetings throughout the semester, GSI check-ins

3 hr/week translates to a mandatory 1 P/NP teaching unit with Professor David Wagner and Professor Swupnil Sahai.

 

Please apply here with your @berkeley.edu email address once you have finalized your Fall 2020 schedule if you're interested! The deadline is Tuesday 8/25 11:59PM.

 

Link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvir_DSVZ8HjQ4dQHWMj0w3aRuT2NFkiQ8GdgznhbEs_Z78A/viewform?usp=sf_linkhttps://forms.gle/5Qteont9eSdDjY6u6

If you have any questions, feel free to send them to Katherine Tsai (katherinetsai@berkeley.edu). Hope to see you all in the fall!
